question: Which one among the following statement is incorrect?
option1: West Bengal is largest producer of Jute textiles in India
option2: India is the second largest Jute goods exporter in the world
option3: After partition of India in 1947, most of the jute mills went to east Pakistan.
answer: After partition of India in 1947, most of the jute mills went to east Pakistan.
explanation: After the partition of Indian Subcontinent in 1947, most of the Jute producing areas went to East Pakistan which is todayâ€™s Bangladesh while most of the Jute mills remained in India.
